name: Premium Cleaning Service
description: Our premium cleaning service offers thorough cleaning using eco-friendly products.
features: Utilizes eco-friendly cleaning products to reduce environmental impact
Provides thorough cleaning for all areas of your home or office
Staffed by experienced and professional cleaners

name: Basic Cleaning Package
description: Our basic cleaning package includes essential cleaning services for your home or office.
features: Covers surface cleaning for all rooms
Includes dusting of furniture and fixtures
Vacuuming of floors to remove dirt and debris

name: Deep Cleaning Special
description: Experience a deep clean with our special package, leaving your space sparkling clean.
features: Offers deep cleaning for hard-to-reach areas and neglected spaces
Specialized stain removal techniques for tough stains
Thorough sanitization to eliminate germs and bacteria

name: Office Cleaning Bundle
description: Keep your workplace pristine with our comprehensive office cleaning bundle.
features: Dedicated to maintaining cleanliness in office spaces
Includes trash disposal and recycling services
Mopping of floors to maintain a professional appearance

name: Move-In/Out Cleaning
description: Ensure a fresh start in your new space or leave your old space spotless with our move-in/out cleaning service.
features: Complete interior cleaning for moving in or out of a space
Thorough cleaning of appliances such as refrigerators and ovens
Wall washing to remove marks and stains

name: Weekly Maintenance Plan
description: Sign up for our weekly maintenance plan and enjoy a consistently clean environment.
features: Scheduled weekly visits to maintain cleanliness
Customized cleaning schedule to fit your needs
